response.original_title: Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds: Live at The Fonda Theatre
response.overview: 10 years ago on February 18th, 2013, Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds marked an evolution in their music by releasing the album Push The Sky Away, a subtle and beautiful record that set the scene for ongoing sonic explorations ever since.  To celebrate this anniversary, their performance at Los Angelesâ€™ Fonda Theatre, from February 21st, 2013, will be available worldwide to watch for free, for a limited time. The band played Push The Sky Away in full followed by a set of classic tracks in the week of release. The concert was streamed worldwide on the night, live on YouTube.
response.title: Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds: Live at The Fonda Theatre

titles.title: Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds: Push the Sky Away - Live from L.A.
